mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as goods_rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT g.GOODS_NO, g.GOODS_TITLE, g.GOODS_PRICE, g.GOODS_STOCK FROM GOODS g, PROJECT p WHERE g.PRO_NO = p.PRO_NO AND p.COMPANY_NO = '4' ORDER BY g.PRO_NO DESC) x) WHERE goods_rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT COUNT(*) AS Allcount from (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT g.GOODS_NO, g.GOODS_TITLE, g.GOODS_PRICE, g.GOODS_STOCK FROM GOODS g, PROJECT p WHERE g.PRO_NO = p.PRO_NO AND p.COMPANY_NO = '4' ORDER BY g.PRO_NO DESC) x) ORDER BY rnum
